name: @annuadvent/ngx-workspace
description: Angular workspace project that makes it easier to integrate and work with multiple angular library and app projects.

scripts./**ng:add:lib: generates a new lib project, provide a param [lib-name]
scripts./**ng:add:app: generates a new app project, provide a param [app-name]
scripts./**ng:add:app:ssr: adds SSR to project app, provide a param [app-name]
scripts./**nh:add:module: Generates all needed files for an angular library module, params: source/path/to/add/module
scripts./**nh:migrate: Migrate from older Libs to this workspace, params: Source/path/older-lib  target/path/of/lib/in-this-workspace
scripts.publish:ngx-common-ui: npm run build:ngx-common-ui && cd dist/ngx-common-ui && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:ngx-core: npm run build:ngx-core && cd dist/ngx-core && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:ngx-tools: npm run build:ngx-tools && cd dist/ngx-tools && npm publish --access public
scripts.build:ssr:ngx-ssr-app:development: npm run build:ngx-ssr-app:development && ng run ngx-ssr-app:server:development
scripts.build:ssr:ngx-ssr-app:staging: npm run build:ngx-ssr-app:staging && ng run ngx-ssr-app:server:staging
scripts.build:ssr:ngx-ssr-app:production: npm run build:ngx-ssr-app:production && ng run ngx-ssr-app:server:production
scripts.firebase:build:ngx-ssr-app:development: npm run build:ssr:ngx-ssr-app:development && npm run firebase:copy:build:ngx-ssr-app
scripts.firebase:build:ngx-ssr-app:staging: npm run build:ssr:ngx-ssr-app:staging && npm run firebase:copy:build:ngx-ssr-app
scripts.firebase:build:ngx-ssr-app:production: npm run build:ssr:ngx-ssr-app:production && npm run firebase:copy:build:ngx-ssr-app
scripts.firebase:serve:ngx-ssr-app:development: npm run firebase:build:ngx-ssr-app:development && cd projects/ngx-ssr-app/firebase-setup && firebase use staging && firebase serve
scripts.firebase:serve:ngx-ssr-app:staging: npm run firebase:build:ngx-ssr-app:staging && cd projects/ngx-ssr-app/firebase-setup && firebase use staging && firebase serve
scripts.firebase:serve:ngx-ssr-app:production: npm run firebase:build:ngx-ssr-app:production && cd projects/ngx-ssr-app/firebase-setup && firebase use production && firebase serve
scripts.firebase:deploy:ngx-ssr-app:staging: npm run firebase:build:ngx-ssr-app:staging && cd projects/ngx-ssr-app/firebase-setup && firebase deploy --except hosting -P staging
scripts.firebase:deploy:ngx-ssr-app:production: npm run firebase:build:ngx-ssr-app:production && cd projects/ngx-ssr-app/firebase-setup && firebase deploy --except hosting -P production
scripts.firebase:deploy:hosting:ngx-ssr-app:stag: cd projects/ngx-ssr-app/firebase-setup && firebase deploy --only hosting:staging -P staging
scripts.firebase:deploy:hosting:ngx-ssr-app:prod: cd projects/ngx-ssr-app/firebase-setup && firebase deploy --only hosting:production -P production
